Any colour as long as it is black, the Canon A1, introduced in 1978.
Arguably the camera that kicked off an era of intense competition and innovation in the development of super competent partially electronic SLRs between the Japanese manufacturers
column2: (Nikon, Pentax, Olympus, Minolta, Yashica) that revolutionised and democratised photography
column3: through automating aperture, shutter speed, one or the other or both.&nbsp
column4: In the process the once dominant West German camera industry was decimated.

column1: It is said of sound amplification rubbish in rubbish out &ndash
column2: amplifiers only make what you put into them louder, they do not enhance it.&nbsp
column3: To a significant extent the same applies to artwork and its reproduction.&nbsp
column4: Yukio Miyamoto's simulations and 3D models of cameras are beautifully realised, we reproduce them at 1440 dpi.&nbsp
column5: The files when we send them to the printer are typically about a giga byte in size.&nbsp
column6: The result is an extraordinary expression of enthusiasm and admiration.
